title: FS: T206 Hindu Perdue SLer SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Hindu Perdue SLer SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hello friends.  This Perdue Hindu has one obvious issue, but otherwise is pretty decent.  One wrinkle at the left border near his elbow.  The back is very bold.  PP Payment Owed/Gift preferred, Check M/O Fine.

$old

Thank you very much for looking!

Best,

Andy
There was its brother on a recent Savage auction. It was a Hickman, exact same issue.

Price Lowered and taking offers on the card.  

Enjoy the rest of your weekend.

Best,

Andy
